mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id , c.user_id , c.store_id , c.cart_quantity , c.product_id , ((sd.store_detail_price * (1-(sd.store_detail_discount/100.0))) * c.cart_quantity) AS cart_total_price , p.product_name , p.product_brand_name , p.product_description , sd.store_detail_id , sd.store_detail_price , (sd.store_detail_price * (1-(sd.store_detail_discount/100.0))) AS store_detail_price_after_discount , sd.store_detail_quantity , s.store_name , ct.category_name FROM cart c JOIN product p ON p.product_id = c.product_id JOIN store_detail sd ON sd.product_id = c.product_id AND sd.store_id = c.store_id JOIN store s ON s.store_id = c.store_id LEFT JOIN category ct ON ct.category_id = p.category_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} AND sd.store_detail_status = 1
